newsitem.title: USA: Colonial Property Trust prices offering.
newsitem.headline: Colonial Property Trust prices offering.

text.p: Colonial Properties Trust said Friday it priced its public offering of 1.7 million shares of common stock at $30.9375 per share.

Colonial said its proceeds after underwriter's discount and before offering expenses, which are expected to be minimal, will be $49.8 million before giving effect to the exercise of the over allotment option.
The offering was completed under a shelf registration statement which became effective in January.
It was sole managed and underwritten by Morgan Stanley Dean Witter which has a 30-day option to buy an additional 255,000 common shares to cover over allotments.
Colonial plans to use the net proceeds of the offering to repay a portion of the outstanding balance on its unsecured line of credit.

After the application of the net proceeds, Colonial's $200 million line of credit will have an outstanding balance of about $68 million, with the unused portion available to fund future acquisitions and developments.
Colonial Properties Trust is a real estate investment trust.
